title: i think that dianas moonfall could use something like....
body:
granting mr and armor for each enemy hit

or granting her next lunar rush extra damage

replies.body: Her Q damage would have to take a hit.

well i could sit here and type all day about dianas flaws strenghts and weaknesses since i main her. id say if it booster her lunar rush then lower lunar rush damage. if granting armor and mr i think this is fair in its entirety since late game diana is charging into the entire enemy team most likely. I mean look at graves....
Armor and MR would make her impossible to duel early and mid.
